entry.content:
Custom Debian i3 workspace environment with additional software focus on high-performance application containers and artificial intelligence.

Stand Alone Complex

Nonsense systems have been reported to run on Debian, Ubuntu and CentOS.

You can use LuaRocks to install the nonsense pkg on Linux.

luarocks install pkg

If the installation fails make sure that you have singularity installed.

For help using pkg, including a list of commands, run:

$ pkg --help

Native

If you can use BitTorrent, please do so and leave the client open for a while so you can seed the files for other users. Otherwise, download.

Live CD/USB
